MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL24 and LL26 postcode area of Betws-Y-Coed and Llanrwst, affecting properties in Pentru Du, Cwm Llannerch and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.15pm due to broken overhead line equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.14pm on 15th April 2021.
